about_the_game:
In this detailed 68-page digital art book, dive into the colorful world of River Tails: Stronger Together.
Take a look at tons of early concepts for the game as well as gorgeous behind-the-scenes art production shots!

Such a lavishly illustrated art book will be a must-have for any fan of River Tails!

Once downloaded, you will find the Digital Artbook as a PDF in the game's local files.

How to access the art book:
1. Install River Tails: Stronger Together
2. Right-click River Tails: Stronger Together in your Steam Library and go to “Properties”
3. In the Properties window, go to “DLC” and confirm that “River Tails: Stronger Together - Art book” is installed
4. In the Properties window, go to “Installed Files” and click “Browse...”
5. File Explorer will open and the "River Tails Digital Artbook pdf" file will be saved in the "art book" folder!"
